item.title: Scientists are developing artificial blood that could save lives in emergencies

item.title: Plane Crashes in Russia’s Far East, Killing All 49 Onboard
item.description: The aircraft was traveling to the town of Tynda when it went off the radar, the regional governor said.

item.title: Sprawling Wildfires Kill 2 and Force Evacuations in Cyprus Amid Stifling Heat
item.description: The fire had burned more than 24,000 acres in Cyprus, where officials had warned of fire danger as temperatures rose above 100 degrees.
